Welcome to Ancient Orient Journeys

A very warm welcome to Ancient Orient Journeys! We are a young and vibrant Asian travel company with a difference. Our travel market is the former Orient of Indo-China. We are tour specialists for Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos and Thailand. You deal and book direct with our head office in Ho Chi Minh City. If you need more information, our UK office will be delighted to assist.

Design Tours

Let us know where you want to visit and what you want to see and do
